## Explore Roche scda synthetic data

```{r}
data("rcd_2022_06_27")

scda_adsl <- rcd_2022_06_27$adsl

scda_advs <- rcd_2022_06_27$advs

adsl_subj <- sort(unique(scda_adsl$USUBJID))
advs_subj <- sort(unique(scda_advs$USUBJID))

rcd_2022_06_27$adsl %>%
  tabyl(COUNTRY)
```



